amendment.description: To provide additional assistance for certain eligible beneficiaries under part D.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1108 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 41. Record Vote Number: 253.
Amendment SA 1108 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S8630-8632, S8637; text: CR S8630) To provide additional assistance for certain eligible beneficiaries under part D.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1108 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 41. Record Vote Number: 253.
